When practicing mindfulness, you focus gently--without judgment--on how your body feels in the present moment.
Practicing mindfulness for a few minutes, a few times a day, reduces stress and prevents lingering bad moods.
I tell clients that mindfulness practice is like "going to the gym to build up emotional muscles."
